member.name: T:FlinkDotNet.Common.Constants.ServicePorts
member.summary: Default port configurations for FlinkDotNet services These values are used as fallbacks when environment variables are not set

member.name: P:FlinkDotNet.Common.Constants.ServicePorts.JobManagerGrpc
member.summary: Default port for JobManager gRPC service (fallback when JOBMANAGER_GRPC_PORT env var not set)

member.name: P:FlinkDotNet.Common.Constants.ServicePorts.JobManagerHttp
member.summary: Default port for JobManager HTTP API (fallback when JOBMANAGER_HTTP_PORT env var not set)

member.name: P:FlinkDotNet.Common.Constants.ServicePorts.Kafka
member.summary: Default port for Kafka service (dynamically assigned by Aspire)

member.name: P:FlinkDotNet.Common.Constants.ServicePorts.Redis
member.summary: Default port for Redis service (dynamically assigned by Aspire)

member.name: P:FlinkDotNet.Common.Constants.ServicePorts.TaskManagerGrpc
member.summary: Default port for TaskManager gRPC service (fallback when TASKMANAGER_GRPC_PORT env var not set)

member.name: T:FlinkDotNet.Common.Constants.ServiceHosts
member.summary: Default host configurations for FlinkDotNet services

member.name: F:FlinkDotNet.Common.Constants.ServiceHosts.Localhost
member.summary: Default localhost address

member.name: F:FlinkDotNet.Common.Constants.ServiceHosts.LocalIP
member.summary: Default local IP address

member.name: T:FlinkDotNet.Common.Constants.ServiceUris
member.summary: Service URI configurations combining hosts and ports

member.name: P:FlinkDotNet.Common.Constants.ServiceUris.JobManagerGrpc
member.summary: Default JobManager gRPC address (secure HTTPS)

member.name: P:FlinkDotNet.Common.Constants.ServiceUris.JobManagerHttp
member.summary: Default JobManager HTTP API address (secure HTTPS)

member.name: P:FlinkDotNet.Common.Constants.ServiceUris.KafkaBootstrapServers
member.summary: Default Kafka bootstrap servers (dynamically assigned by Aspire)

member.name: P:FlinkDotNet.Common.Constants.ServiceUris.RedisConnectionString
member.summary: Default Redis connection string (dynamically assigned by Aspire)

member.name: M:FlinkDotNet.Common.Constants.ServiceUris.TaskManagerGrpc
member.summary: Default TaskManager gRPC address (secure HTTPS)

member.name: M:FlinkDotNet.Common.Constants.ServiceUris.TaskManagerGrpc(System.Int32)
member.summary: TaskManager gRPC address with specified port (secure HTTPS)

member.name: T:FlinkDotNet.Common.Constants.ServiceUris.Insecure
member.summary: Insecure service URIs for local development only
Service URIs for insecure HTTP connections. WARNING: These should only be used for local development and testing. For production environments, use the Secure class with HTTPS endpoints.

member.name: P:FlinkDotNet.Common.Constants.ServiceUris.Insecure.JobManagerGrpcHttp
member.summary: JobManager gRPC address (insecure HTTP - use only for local development) For production, use Secure.JobManagerGrpcHttps instead.

member.name: P:FlinkDotNet.Common.Constants.ServiceUris.Insecure.JobManagerHttpApi
member.summary: JobManager HTTP API address (insecure HTTP - use only for local development) For production, use Secure.JobManagerHttpsApi instead.

member.name: M:FlinkDotNet.Common.Constants.ServiceUris.Insecure.TaskManagerGrpcHttp
member.summary: TaskManager gRPC address (insecure HTTP - use only for local development) For production, use Secure.TaskManagerGrpcHttps instead.

member.name: M:FlinkDotNet.Common.Constants.ServiceUris.Insecure.TaskManagerGrpcHttp(System.Int32)
member.summary: TaskManager gRPC address with specified port (insecure HTTP - use only for local development) For production, use Secure.TaskManagerGrpcHttps instead.

member.name: T:FlinkDotNet.Common.Constants.ServiceUris.Secure
member.summary: Service URIs for secure HTTPS connections. Use these for production environments.

member.name: P:FlinkDotNet.Common.Constants.ServiceUris.Secure.JobManagerGrpcHttps
member.summary: JobManager gRPC address (secure HTTPS - recommended for production)

member.name: P:FlinkDotNet.Common.Constants.ServiceUris.Secure.JobManagerHttpsApi
member.summary: JobManager HTTP API address (secure HTTPS - recommended for production)

member.name: M:FlinkDotNet.Common.Constants.ServiceUris.Secure.TaskManagerGrpcHttps
member.summary: TaskManager gRPC address (secure HTTPS - recommended for production)

member.name: M:FlinkDotNet.Common.Constants.ServiceUris.Secure.TaskManagerGrpcHttps(System.Int32)
member.summary: TaskManager gRPC address with specified port (secure HTTPS - recommended for production)
